channel.title: Vulnerability & Workload Protection (DevSecOps) with CodePipeline, CodeBuild, ECR & ECS on AWS Immersion Day with Lacework
channel.description: Recent content in Vulnerability & Workload Protection (DevSecOps) with CodePipeline, CodeBuild, ECR & ECS on AWS Immersion Day with Lacework

item.title: Architecture
item.description: In this section, we will set up a CI/CD pipeline with AWS CodePipeline and CodeBuild. Our pipeline will take our code from CodeCommit and build a docker image. It will the image to Amazon Elastic Container Registry (ECR). Then we will deploy it to a staging environment that runs on an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS) cluster using a Lambda function. At each stage, Lacework protects your application and cloud environment.
